title: Did the National Football Association tweet Cam Newton $253,552 to give him football away?
subtitle: Rumor has it that Carolina Panthers, the quarterback of Cam Newton, is punished by thousands of dollars by football every time he delivers a football to a fan in the bleachers.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Carolina Panthers quarterback Cam Newton was fined a total of $253, 552 for giving him football to fans.
